text:
Joseph Williams (4 October 1934 – 4 September 2020) was a Cook Islands politician and medical doctor. He was Prime Minister of the Cook Islands for four months in 1999.
In August 2020, Williams was hospitalised in Auckland after testing positive for COVID-19. He died on 4 September 2020 from the infection, aged 85.

annotations.surface_form: Prime Minister of the Cook Islands
